Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This user story implies an implementation(lifecycle system cc) and is missing rationale or motivation. Questions: is the user really the chaincode developer or the network stakeholder/owners? eg who needs to manage chaincode deployment policy? Also, there are likely additional stories needed to decompose this even further to address exactly what sort of policy constraints are needed. Finally, it would help to add motivation or rationale as to why this is needed.
